message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that holds significant value, potentially exceeding $1500000. While I can't disclose specifics about the product at this time, I'm confident it will be of great interest to you. My asking price is $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, as I have another buyer willing to pay $1500000. Consider this your chance to acquire something truly special. Let me know your thoughts.
